name: diary-depresiku
description: Diary Depresiku - Mental Health Tracking App

scripts.install-backend: cd app/backend_api && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt || python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: cd app/backend_api && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 || python3 -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
